long_description: REI Endeavor Pants in petite sizes have just about every detail you'd want in all-weather hiking clothing, including quick-drying fabric that stretches so you can move comfortably. Durable double-weave polyester/spandex fabric provides 4-way stretch for excellent range of motion and comfort while climbing and hiking. Fabric is wind resistant up to 30 mph and has a durable water repellent finish. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Polyester tricot lines the waistband to wick sweat and enhance comfort. Fit adjustment is quick and easy, thanks to a cord cleat inside the waistband. Center gusset extends your range of motion; ergonomic seam placement and articulated knees allow comfortable movement. Zippered hems with rip-and-stick tabs allow pants to adjust around boots; ankle scuff guards are bonded rather than sewn for enhanced durability. Two zip hand pockets, a welded zip leg pocket and 2 rear pockets provide plenty of storage options. REI Endeavor Pants in petite sizes have a classic fit that's cut just right for easy wearing.
short_description: REI Endeavor Pants in petite sizes have just about every detail you'd want in all-weather hiking clothing, including quick-drying fabric that stretches so you can move comfortably.
